mapper.sql: a.goods_id as "goodsId", a.title as "title", a.ditle as "ditle", a.pic as "pic", a.orgPrice as "orgPrice", a.price as "price", a.isTmall as "isTmall", a.salesNum as "salesNum", a.dsr as "dsr", a.sellerID as "sellerID", a.introduce as "introduce", a.quanPrice as "quanPrice", a.quanCondition as "quanCondition", a.quanLink as "quanLink", a.qQuanMLink as "qQuanMLink", a.aliClick as "aliClick", a.type as "type", a.quan_surplus as "quanSurplus", a.quan_time as "quanTime"
mapper.select: select from p_youhuiquan a where a.goods_id = #{goodsId}
select from p_youhuiquan a where LOCATE(#{title},a.title)>0 and a.quan_surplus>5 LIMIT #{page},20
select from p_youhuiquan a where a.quan_surplus>5 LIMIT #{page},#{pageSize}
select from p_youhuiquan a where LOCATE(#{title},a.title)>0 and a.quan_surplus>5 order by #{sort} LIMIT #{page},20
